title: Supporting local businesses as valued patron
description: Supporting local businesses as valued patron
content:
Scenario: Supporting local businesses as valued patron
    Given Jordan visits the neighborhood coffee shop weekly
    And the barista knows Jordan's regular order
    When Jordan enters the coffee shop
    Then the personal_agent might help with ordering if needed
    And the barista greets Jordan by name and remembers their preference
    And Jordan's weekly purchase contributes to business sustainability
    And Jordan experiences being a valued, recognized customer
    And the relationship is genuine, not charity or pity
    And Jordan's economic participation in neighborhood is visible
